Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### MRR Plot

```{r}
# combine the selected variables into a new data frame
selected_data <- reactive({
  
  mrr <- mrr[, c("mrr_date", input$segments, "mrr")]
  
  groups <- mrr %>% 
    select(-mrr_date, -mrr)
  
  group_args <- c(groups, sep="_")
  group_values <- do.call(paste, group_args)
  
  mrr$segment <- group_values
  
  mrr
  
})

renderPlot({
  
  p <- selected_data() %>% 
    group_by(mrr_date, segment) %>% 
    summarise(mrr = sum(mrr)) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    mutate(segment = reorder(segment, -mrr)) %>% 
    ggplot(aes_string(x = 'mrr_date', y = 'mrr')) + 
    geom_line() +
    stat_smooth(method = 'loess') +
    facet_wrap(~ segment, scales = "free_y", ncol = 3) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = dollar) +
    labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, title = NULL) +
    theme(legend.position = "none")
  p
  
})
```
